languages.text: "Чтобы передать тебе трофей, который может пригодиться в грядущих битвах. Эта вещь принадлежала Каллигосу. Она сотворена для войны, но я не желаю держать в руках нечто подобное. Быть может, она послужит в походе тебе".

"To give you a trophy that may serve you well in the battles to come. This used to belong to Calligos. It was made for war but I have no desire to wield it or anything like it, for that matter. Perhaps it will be of use to you in your campaign."
languages.original_text: "Чтобы передать тебе трофей, который может пригодиться в грядущих битвах. Эта вещь принадлежала Каллигосу. Она сотворена для войны, но я не желаю держать в руках нечто подобное. Быть может, она послужит в походе тебе".

traits.locale_text: "To give you a trophy that may serve you well in the battles to come. This used to belong to Calligos. It was made for war, but I have no desire to wield it or anything like it. Perhaps it will be of use to you in your campaign."

"To give you a trophy that may serve you well in the battles to come. This used to belong to Calligos. It was made for war but I have no desire to wield it or anything like it, for that matter. Perhaps it will be of use to you in your campaign."

languages.text: “我想送给你一件战利品。它是卡里戈斯的遗物，是为战争而生的，但我并不打算留着它，也不打算留着其他类似的东西。或许，这件遗物会在您接下来的战斗中发挥作用。”
languages.original_text: "To give you a trophy that may serve you well in the battles to come. This used to belong to Calligos. It was made for war but I have no desire to wield it or anything like it, for that matter. Perhaps it will be of use to you in your campaign."

traits.locale_text: “我想送给你一件战利品。它是卡里戈斯的遗物，是为战争而生的，但我并不打算留着它，也不打算留着其他类似的东西。或许，这件遗物会在您接下来的战斗中发挥作用。”

languages.text: "Ich will Euch eine Trophäe geben, die Euch in den kommenden Schlachten von Nutzen sein könnte. Dies hat einmal Calligos gehört. Sie wurde für den Krieg gefertigt, doch ich verspüre nicht den Wunsch, sie oder etwas ähnliches je zu führen. Vielleicht könnt Ihr sie bei Eurem Feldzug gebrauchen."
languages.original_text: "To give you a trophy that may serve you well in the battles to come. This used to belong to Calligos. It was made for war but I have no desire to wield it or anything like it, for that matter. Perhaps it will be of use to you in your campaign."

traits.locale_text: "Ich will Euch eine Trophäe geben, die Euch in den kommenden Schlachten von Nutzen sein könnte. Dies hat einmal Calligos gehört. Sie wurde für den Krieg gefertigt, doch ich verspüre nicht den Wunsch, sie oder etwas ähnliches je zu führen. Vielleicht könnt Ihr sie bei Eurem Feldzug gebrauchen."

languages.text: «Entregarle un trofeo que le sirva bien en las batallas venideras. Esto perteneció a Calligos. Se creó para la guerra, pero no albergo el más mínimo deseo de empuñarla, ni nada que se le parezca. Quizá le resulte de utilidad en su campaña».
languages.original_text: "To give you a trophy that may serve you well in the battles to come. This used to belong to Calligos. It was made for war but I have no desire to wield it or anything like it, for that matter. Perhaps it will be of use to you in your campaign."

traits.locale_text: «Entregarle un trofeo que le sirva bien en las batallas venideras. Esto perteneció a Calligos. Se creó para la guerra, pero no albergo el más mínimo deseo de empuñarla, ni nada que se le parezca. Quizá le resulte de utilidad en su campaña».

languages.text: « Je suis venu vous donner un trophée qui pourrait vous être utile dans les batailles à venir. Il appartenait à Calligos. C'est une arme de guerre, mais je n'ai aucune envie de brandir ce genre de choses. Peut-être saurez-vous en faire bon usage au cours de votre campagne ? »
languages.original_text: "To give you a trophy that may serve you well in the battles to come. This used to belong to Calligos. It was made for war but I have no desire to wield it or anything like it, for that matter. Perhaps it will be of use to you in your campaign."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis venu vous donner un trophée qui pourrait vous être utile dans les batailles à venir. Il appartenait à Calligos. C'est une arme de guerre, mais je n'ai aucune envie de brandir ce genre de choses. Peut-être saurez-vous en faire bon usage au cours de votre campagne ? »

languages.text: 「これからの戦いに役立つ戦利品を贈るためだ。これはかつてはカリゴスのものだった。戦いのために作られたものだが、私はこのようなものを使いたいとは思わない。もしかしたら、あなたの作戦に役立つかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "To give you a trophy that may serve you well in the battles to come. This used to belong to Calligos. It was made for war but I have no desire to wield it or anything like it, for that matter. Perhaps it will be of use to you in your campaign."

traits.locale_text: 「これからの戦いに役立つ戦利品を贈るためだ。これはかつてはカリゴスのものだった。戦いのために作られたものだが、私はこのようなものを使いたいとは思わない。もしかしたら、あなたの作戦に役立つかもしれない」

languages.text: "Gelecekteki savaşlarda size hizmet edebilecek bir ganimet vermek için. Bu, eskiden Calligos'a aitti. Savaş için yapılmıştı ama onu ya da benzerini kullanmaya niyetim yok. Belki seferinizde size yardımcı olur."
languages.original_text: "To give you a trophy that may serve you well in the battles to come. This used to belong to Calligos. It was made for war but I have no desire to wield it or anything like it, for that matter. Perhaps it will be of use to you in your campaign."

traits.locale_text: "Gelecekteki savaşlarda size hizmet edebilecek bir ganimet vermek için. Bu, eskiden Calligos'a aitti. Savaş için yapılmıştı ama onu ya da benzerini kullanmaya niyetim yok. Belki seferinizde size yardımcı olur."
